title: A couple questions about Kayne's Shadow Assassin passive
body:
1. Is the magic damage considered ability damage (for the sake of sorcery for instance)?
2. Does item damage benefit from the passive?  Examples: {{item:3153}} (both passive and active), {{item:3147}}, {{item:1418}}, {{item:3042}}, {{item:3115}}, {{item:3077}} (passive and active), {{item:3057}} (and its upgrades)

Obviously wouldn't build all of these, but I'm curious.
